description: This course is devoted to team research/development projects, employing established software development methodologies. Projects frequently have an interdisciplinary nature, involving consultation with faculty and/or students in other fields, and taking advantage of the particular backgrounds of team members. One or more research papers, posters, etc., on results are ordinarily expected. Prerequisites: Two ore more core courses in computer science or permission of instructor. Next offered in Interim 2010 and Interim 2012.
name: Advanced Team Project
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Two ore more core courses in computer science or permission of instructor. Next offered in Interim 2010 and Interim 2012.
